item.description: Yes DCQ is the band that just performed at the Wedeln Golf Tournament. Darlene Stokes has tracked down one of their upcoming gigs and decided to invite Wedelns and the Meetup. The 6 piece band of former Berklee students really knows how to rock the room or in the case of the of our golf tournament - rock the party tent! This is definitely a band you can dance to! This event is ideal for any Metro-West people that may have trouble getting into the big city. If you have looking to get together with the wedeln crew now is your chance. Please contact Darlene if you would like to attend. She will be the point of contact, not me. Band info: http://www.dcqmusic.com Venue info: http://thechickenbone.com
item.how_to_find_us: check with Darlene before you go.
item.name: Project DCQ live at The Chicken Bone
